text: The Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy (CIDRAP) is a heath center in the University of Minnesota. It deals with public health and responding to infectious diseases. It was established in 2001. == Biography == Michael Osterholm the Center to prevent illness and infectious disease. In 2019, he did this with Seattle Children's Research Institute. == References == Category:Minneapolis Category:Public health
title: Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy
